Class Triangle2D

java.lang.Object
pegasus.graphics.AbstractTriangle<Vector2>
pegasus.graphics.Triangle2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Triangle<Vector2>
public class Triangle2D extends AbstractTriangle<Vector2>
A two-dimensional triangle.

    • map

      public Triangle2D map(UnaryOperator<Vector2> mapper)
      Applies the provided mapper function to each vertex of this triangle, then returns a new triangle of the return values of the provided mapper function.
      Parameters:
      mapper - The mapper function of which to apply to each vertex of this triangle
      Returns:
      The resulting triangle
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided mapper function is null
